Name: Life Partners Holdings, Inc
Description: DELISTED - Life Partners Holdings, Inc. (Life Partners) is a specialty financial services company and the parent company. The Company is engaged in the secondary market for life insurance known as life settlements. The Company provides purchasing services for life settlements to its client base. The Company is a parent company of Life Partners, Inc. (LPI). LPI is engaged in the secondary market for life insurance known as life settlements. LPI facilitates the sale of life settlements between sellers and purchasers, but does not take possession or control of the policies. It facilitates these transactions by identifying, examining, and purchasing the policies as agent for the purchasers. It has made investments in software and processes that enable them to facilitate volume of transactions . The Company has facilitated over 148,000 purchaser transactions involving over 6,500 policies.
